DellPCIeFunction.description: An instance of DellPCIeFunction will have PCI device specific data.
DellPCIeFunction.longDescription: An instance of DellPCIeFunction will have PCI device specific data.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DellPCIeFunction.description: DellPCIeFunction will have PCI device specific data.
DellPCIeFunction.longDescription: DellPCIeFunction will have PCI device specific data.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DataBusWidth.description: Data bus width of the PCI.
DataBusWidth.longDescription: Data bus width of the PCI.

LastSystemInventoryTime.description: This property provides the last time System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastSystemInventoryTime.longDescription: This property provides the last time System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

LastUpdateTime.description: This property provides the last time the data was updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastUpdateTime.longDescription: This property provides the last time the data was updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

SlotLength.description: Slot length of the PCI device.
SlotLength.longDescription: Slot length of the PCI device.

SlotType.description: Slot type of the PCI device.Note: Depending on value for DriveFormFactor property under DellPCIeSSD or DellDrives,the SlotType value can be EDSFF E1.S or EDSFF E1.L
SlotType.longDescription: Slot type of the PCI device.Note: Depending on value for DriveFormFactor property under DellPCIeSSD or DellDrives,the SlotType value can be EDSFF E1.S or EDSFF E1.L
